lg.l: Close the door, don't look around
I'll be watching…. Waiting…
Dream of where I can be found
I will be there again
Walking down the road so far
To the morning, the light
Breaking off that spell away
That you put on me last night
Don't take it away from me
Don't walk away
Put on your spell on me
Please stay
So many days, so lonely nights
I was watching… waiting…
For you to come and hold me tight
I wanna feel it tonight
I closed my eyes, I ran away
I was sleeping 'till dawn
I walked and found myself alone
'Couse you walked away… you're gone
